details.description: ESOP is an annual conference devoted to fundamental issues in the specification, design, analysis, and implementation of programming languages and systems.

submission_scheme.note: Deadlines are firm and will not be extended.

Research Papers.description: Articles that advance the state-of-the-art on the theory and practice of programming languages and systems.
Research Papers.format: Springer's LNCS, ACM's PACMPL, or ACM's TOPLAS format

Experience Reports.description: Articles reporting on systems and techniques developed in practice.
Experience Reports.evaluation: Must include critical evaluation of the experience reported

Fresh Perspectives.description: Articles that promote new insights on programming languages and systems.
